## LinearCardContainer.getSelected() method

Gets whether the given card is marked as selected.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getSelected(index: number): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  index | number | Index of the card to get. |

**Returns:**

boolean

Selection state of the given card.
